project.description: This bundle sole objective is to allow shim driver fragments to be installed by the feature installer in Karaf 4.X. The feature installer verifies all requirements before installing a bundle. Because fragment bundles have a requirement of "Fragment-Host" it is required for a host, where the fragment can attach to, to be installed before installing the fragment. However, the current shim drivers depend on classes from the fragment for activation, as such no shim driver host can be installed without a fragment. To break this circular issue this bundle provides a dummy host to which fragments can attach to and then the real driver hosts can be installed given that the fragments are already deployed.
